dependencies.description:
Pillow-SIMD is a SIMD-enabled fork of Pillow. It is usually 4-6x faster
than the original Pillow in image processing benchmarks.
dependencies.name: pil

dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description: A cross-platform clipboard module for Python.
dependencies.name: py-pyperclip

dependencies.description: python3-xlib is python3 version of python-xlib.
dependencies.name: py-python3-xlib

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
PyAutoGUI lets your Python scripts control the mouse and keyboard to
automate interactions with other applications.
dependent_to.name: py-pyautogui

description:
An application to display XY position and RGB color information for the
pixel currently under the mouse. Works on Python 2 and 3. This is useful
for GUI automation planning.
name: py-mouseinfo

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
